Author: give-me-brie
Text: If your parents have full control of your meals then they just know what’s going on so that’s good! I think really the only way around this is explaining to them that your brother is triggering you FAR too much for you to be able to focus on your recovery.   I get how difficult it is, because you will likely feel guilty for placing any burden on him, but if he cares about you he’ll hopefully understand. But u gotta focus on u now and be selfish!
